oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ANALYSIS OF DIRECTIONAL WAVE SYSTEMS AND CROSSING SEAS IN THE MEDITERRANEAN SEA
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Francesco, De Leo
Manuel, Corrales-Gonzalez
Giulia, Cremonini
Giovanni, Besio
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We present a methodology for the detection of directional wave systems at given locations. The methodology relies on image processing algorithms used to extract relevant features from time-series of integral parameters of spectral partitions. A case study is developed in the Mediterranean Sea (MS); the wave systems extracted are next used to assess the frequency of occurrence of crossing seas in the area, which may be dangerous for the safety of navigation.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 38 (2024): Proceedings of 38th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Rome, Italy, 2024; waves.4
